summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of DealHunt e-commerce offers aggregator. All major functionality working correctly including homepage, search/filters, authentication, admin panel, offer management, and save/unsave features. Mobile responsive design excellent.

design_issues.issue: Dropdown clicking had some automation issues during testing, but dropdowns are visible and functional

passed_tests: Homepage loads with 6 offer cards displayed correctly
Search functionality works (iPhone, Nike, Samsung searches)
Admin stats display (6 offers, 6 active, 3 users, 0 saved)
Add new offer form opens and fields fillable
Manage offers section with 6 offers listed
Delete offer functionality with success message
Saved offers page navigation and display
Grab Deal buttons with proper external links
Login dialog opens properly on mobile
All backend API endpoints (18/18 tests passed)
